Hi all, 
< 
> 
12/4/2020 
9:39 
> 12/3/2020 5:24 
Today our office is sending via FedEx a replacement drive for Ghislaine Maxwell, which should arrive at the M 
DC tomorrow. This drive will replace the drive that Maxwell recently dropped and broke, and the accompanying 
cover letters are attached. Would you please make sure Maxwell is given access to this drive? 
Would you please mail the broken drive back to our office? It can be mailed to the below address: 
Paralegal Specialist 
U.S. 
Attorneys Office, SDNY 
New York, NY 10007 
Thanks very much, as always, for your help. 
Best, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00031960

New York, NY 10007
